column2: "Looks like you came."
"<%me>, sorry for surprising you."
"Lately you've just been looking so caught up in thought, I've been wondering..."
"...who is that?"
"1. You can see her?"
"2. There's no one there."
"Yes, is it someone I'm not supposed to see?"
"But, there's someone wearing white right there."
"The fact that she can see me is not a problem. She's different from Luther."
"Like you, she's someone who has a relation to me. It's only natural she can see me."
"I don't know why. I don't think I've met you and yet I feel very nostalgic somehow."
"You don't need to think about it now. In time, it will come back to you."
"I'm not sure exactly what you mean, but I trust your opinion."
"I wonder if you're trusting me again, or is it that you still trust me?"
"I trust you because <%me> trusts you."
"I must thank you. Because you saved her at that time and that place, this has come to pass."
"Because of that action, with sometime it will become a key to the future."
"But more importantly than that..."
"Thank you for saving her. You have my gratitude."
"It's like she's there and yet she's not there. It's hard to understand."
"But she seems very warm. Almost like the same feeling when I first met you."
"It seems you're involved in something very difficult, and this might add to that."
"But please don't forget that I trust you and I'm always here for you."

"新たに発見された惑星「ウォパル」。
水の惑星、って感じで綺麗だけど
……どこか、いびつな感じだね。"

"襲ってくるエネミーもそうだし
出会った原住民もそう。惑星の気候も
何だか全部、人工的な感じ。"

"原住民が翻訳無しで会話できるのも
何か理由があるはずじゃん？
うーむむ、キナ臭い感じだねー……"

"キナ臭いといえば、ルーサーだよ。
相変わらず人をだまくらかして
好き勝手に利用してるんだね。"

"これはあくまで記録の再生だから
直接懲らしめに行けないのが歯がゆい！"

"テオドールくん、あんまり他人事に
思えないんだよね。
この後どうなっちゃうんだろう。"

"何か干渉できそうなシオンはシオンで
ようやく二代目ちゃんとコンタクトか。"

"それにしても、二代目ちゃんはこのとき
どうしてシオンを認識できたんだろう？
この時点で縁があったってことだよね？"

"うーむ、気になることが増えてきた。
見てる甲斐があるってものだよ。
さ、次の記録を確認してみよう。"

"
Received Matter Board [The Will to Bring About Change for Tomorrow]
"
